DOC.brief_summary: The objective study evaluate impact pharmacogenomic aspect drug metabolism measurement drug drug metabolites urine drug testing ( UDT ) .
DOC.brief_title: Urine Toxicology With Pharmacogenomic Interpretation Assay : UTOPIA
DOC.criteria: Able provide write informed consent Pharmacogenomic testing within last 60 day Planned UDT Subject chronic renal dysfunction , Chronic Kidney Disease Stage 4 5 Subject history abnormal hepatic function within last 2 year ( INR > 1.2 attributable anticoagulant medication , AST ALT > 1.5x normal , suspected cirrhosis ) Subject history malabsorption ( short gut syndrome ) ; Subject history gastric small bowel surgery ; Subject currently hospitalize ; Subject currently receive intravenous medication .
